    public class practice10
extends acm.program.GraphicsProgram
    Contains solutions for problems from 10th practice seminar. Topic: Creating animations on canvas.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addSuperMovingBall

        private void addSuperMovingBall()
        Adds a ball at the center of the canvas. Moves the ball until program coloses, changes the direction when it collides with vertical or horizontal borders.

      • changeVy

        private void changeVy()
        Changes vertical direction and speed of the ball.

      • getSign

        private int getSign(double n)
        Returns the sign of the number. -1 if negative, 1 if positive, 0 if none.
